title: UK steel firms on edge as talks to cut Trump tariffs near deadline
description: British industry could still be hit by levy on exports to US as No 10 confirms deal on reduction not completed
content:
British steelmakers face a nervous wait to discover if they will be hit by US tariffs, after the UK government said it was trying to complete a deal to protect the industry from Donald Trump’s trade war.
The US has set a 50% tariff on foreign steel a... [2893 chars]

title: Novak Djokovic teases crowd and De Minaur before reaching Wimbledon quarter-finals
description: The seven-time champion lost the first set in 30 minutes before recovering to beat Alex de Minaur 1-6, 6-4, 6-4, 6-4
content: Novak Djokovic won his 101st match at Wimbledon and advanced to his eighth consecutive quarter-final at SW19. Not that this was enough for the Serbian all-timer. In an act of grand generosity, he threw away the first set to his challenger Alex de Min... [4601 chars]

title: France and UK expected to announce joint plan on small boat crossings
description: Starmer and Macron could set out plans for a ‘one in, one out’ returns scheme for asylum seekers
content:
Keir Starmer and Emmanuel Macron are expected to announce plans for French police to do more to block small boats crossing the Channel at a summit in London this week, but a wider deal on returning asylum seekers is still up in the air.
While details... [3197 chars]

title: Tesla shares dive as investors fear new Elon Musk political party will damage brand
description: Fall of 7.5% in early trading wipes $76bn off firm’s value as market frets CEO’s foray into politics will distract from role
content:
Shares in Tesla fell 7.5% in early US trading on Monday, wiping $76bn (£56bn) off the company’s value, amid investor concern that Elon Musk’s launch of a new political party will present further problems for the electric carmaker.
Tesla’s market capi... [2428 chars]

title: Highly infectious new XFG Covid strain has one unique symptom
description: Stratus has two strains, XFG and XFG.2, which currently make up approximately 30% of Covid cases in England, according to the UK Health Security Agency.
content:
Stratus has become the dominant strain spreading across the UK
A new Covid strain extending across Britain has one very distinct sympton, an expert has claimed. Known as Stratus, it has become the most dominant strain spreading in the UK after first ... [1272 chars]
